overview: Yudi has just got out of jail but Bono and the gang force him to commit another crime. Unlike the others in the gang who spend their money for fun right away, Yudi saves his money in the bank. He then meets Sari and starts changing his life. Bono and the gang are mad when they find out about it and they kidnap Sariâ€™s sister. Then Yudi has to fight them and they all die, including Yudi.
title: Live, Love and Tears
